QuestData.Title: Not Soon Forgotten
QuestData.Description: The Kvaldir leader has shown his rotting, ugly face but a short swim from here, down this hall to our west. We kill him now and the Kvaldir occupation of our once beloved city shall be ended.$B$BBeware Battlemaiden, for he is no weakling. He has many Kvaldir at his command. Some Sira'kess Sea Witches have been dispatched to weaken him during your attack, but they will be interrupted if you let any of his Kvaldir attack them.$B$BShow no mercy, Battlemaiden.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Leader of the Kvaldir forces in Vashj'ir, Varkul is known for being prideful and fearless.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Varkul the Unrelenting.$B$BThis task is part of a Naz'jar Battlemaiden vision. If needed, use the Blade of the Naz'jar Battlemaiden at a time focus to return to the vision.
QuestData.CompletionText: Your foe is but a short swim down this hall. Go, and bring death with you.
QuestData.RewardText: <The Kvaldir General crumples to the ground, defeated.>$B$B<With this, the ruins of Vashj'ir have been claimed for Lady Naz'jar. Her ultimate goals remain uncertain, but it is clear that the naga came here with purpose.>$B$B<If only you could continue, you are sure that the answers to defeating the naga lie within this vision, but the Wavespeaker's magics are waning, and you are losing your connection with the Battlemaiden.>
